It was introduced in [[Update "Hot Tracks"]]. The ASRAD-R received a number of improvements over the [[Lvrbv 701]]: The launcher array is now unmanned and located higher above the ground, which allows for the hull to remain in cover while still being effective in all directions thanks to the increased horizontal traverse angles. With access to 8 long-range supersonic missiles, the ASRAD-R proves to be quite deadly, especially against enemy helicopters. == General info == === Survivability and armour === {{Specs-Tank-Armour}} ''Describe armour protection.
